sep.gaia.resources

Class ResourceObservable<R extends DataResource>

  • java.lang.Object
    • sep.gaia.resources.ResourceObservable<R>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataResourceManager

    public class ResourceObservable<R extends DataResource>
extends java.lang.Object
    A ResourceObservable is observed by a ResourceObserver implementation. The ResourceObserver gets notified by this class, if something was changing in this class.
    Author:
    Johannes Bauer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ResourceObservable() 

    • Method Summary

      void clearAll()
      Invokes to onClear()-Event at each registered observer.

      Notifies all observers that are registered to this ResourceObservable.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ResourceObservable

        public ResourceObservable()

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public boolean register(ResourceObserver<R> observer)
        Registers an observer for this management object. The observer will be informed about a change of state by calling onUpdate(), until he ends his abonnement by calling unregister().
        Parameters:
        observer - The observer who wants to be registered.
        Returns:
        true, if the observer could be added successfully. return false, if the observer has already been registered.

      • unregister

        public boolean unregister(ResourceObserver<R> observer)
        Removes an observer from the state changing informing list. This removed observer won't be notified in the future.
        Parameters:
        observer - The observer which should be removed.
        Returns:
        true, if observer was a registered observer and the removing was successful. Else return false.

      • notifyAll

        public void notifyAll(java.util.Collection<R> resources)
        Notifies all observers that are registered to this ResourceObservable.
        Parameters:
        resources - A collection of resources which hold the change of the state.

      • clearAll

        public void clearAll()
        Invokes to onClear()-Event at each registered observer.
